snippet.title: Quar: Battle for Gate 18 - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Quar: Battle for Gate 18 is available on Steam! Play with the HTC Vive http://store.steampowered.com/app/436940/
It is a room scale game, but can be played seated in you prefer.

Quar: Battle for Gate is a turn-based strategic VR game set in the grimsical world of Alwyd. The Quar are cute alien ant-eaters. Don't mistake cute for gentle. They use their WW1 level technology to wage war across the face of their world.
